unless you made a usb installer out of it
so it stops being an iso after that; but coming back to your question, i havent seen mine asking for the 'net
that looks like a netboot image
dont know if this is what you want but look here --> http://paul.jurco.ro/2008/02/28/ubuntu-console-text-size/
